name: Remote OLLAMA API
onCreateCommand: apt-get updat && apt-get install curl git wget python3-pip cron lshw lspci psmisc lsof -y
updateContentCommand: pip install flask==2.0.2 && pip install werkzeug==2.0.3 && pip install requests==2.26.0 && pip install python-dotenv==0.19.1 && pip install requests && pip install python-dotenv && pip install llama-cpp-pytho && export OLLAMA_HOST=0.0.0.0:11434 && curl https://ollama.ai/install.sh | sh && ollama serve > /dev/null 2>&1 >output.log 2>&1 &
postCreateCommand: ollama pull tinyllama && wget -c https://github.com/gali1/external-codebase/raw/main/text-gen-webui/main.py && wget -c https://github.com/gali1/external-codebase/raw/main/text-gen-webui/index.html && echo '* * * * * python /workspaces/external-codebase/main.py' >> /var/spool/cron/crontabs/root && python main.py
